songs.title: Dreamstate
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Jenna Russo]
My systems call to the ocean
And we make war with old friends
And you can't hold my heart close enough to your chest
Your eyes are dark
Your eyes are dark

[Chorus: Jenna Russo]
Something in the way that you walk and you talk and
Something in the way
We're caught up in a dreamstate
Something in the way that you walk and you talk and
Something in the way
We're caught up in a dreamstate

[Verse 2: Tim Carroll]
I took a train to the west
To get away catch my breath
And you can't hold my heart close enough to your chest
Your eyes are dark
Your eyes are dark

[Chorus: Jenna Russo]
Something in the way that you walk and you talk and
Something in the way
We're caught up in a dreamstate
Something in the way that you walk and you talk and
Something in the way
We're caught up in a dreamstate
We're caught up in a dreamstate
We're cauhgt up in a dreamstate

[Bridge: Jenna Russo & Tim Carroll]
I know you're hurting just hold on
Hold on this moment will pass
I know you're hurting just hold on
Hold on this moment will pass
I know you're hurting just hold on
Hold on this moment will pass
I know you're hurting just hold on
Hold on this moment will pass
We're caught up in a dreamstate

[Chorus: Jenna Russo]
Something in the way that you walk and you talk and
Something in the way
We're caught up in a dreamstate
Something in the way that you walk and you talk and
Something in the way
We're caught up in a dreamstate
We're caught up in a dreamstate
We're caught up in a dreamstate
